meanings.definition: A polymer composed of identical repeating units.
meanings.sent1: The homopolymer was made up of the same building blocks over and over.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the homopolymer to understand its structure better.
meanings.sent3: The homopolymer walked into a party full of clones and felt right at home.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was a homopolymer, always sticking to the same ideas.
meanings.sent5: The homopolymer chain gleamed under the microscope, revealing its uniformity.

meanings.definition: A substance formed by the polymerization of a single type of monomer.
meanings.sent1: The chemist synthesized a homopolymer in the lab for her experiment.
meanings.sent2: The homopolymer's properties were different from those of other polymers.
meanings.sent3: The homopolymer and the monomer had a heated debate about their origins.
meanings.sent4: The homopolymer stood out in the mixture, proud of its singular composition.
meanings.sent5: The homopolymer's formation was a result of precise chemical reactions.
